app.name: 2026 Boilerplate
home.title: Build Modern Web Apps
home.subtitle: A full-stack TypeScript starter kit with authentication, encrypted storage, and a modern developer experience.
home.feature.fast.title: Fast Development
home.feature.fast.description: Vite-powered HMR with TypeScript, React 19, and Express running together seamlessly.
home.feature.auth.title: Built-in Auth
home.feature.auth.description: Passport.js authentication with encrypted localStorage for secure client-side data persistence.

home.feature.production.description: ESLint, Cypress E2E tests, and Redux Toolkit — battle-tested tools configured and ready to go.
